description: This step involves simulating urban traffic flows to evaluate various traffic signal timing strategies and determine the optimal configuration for reducing congestion.

methods_used.description: Simulating individual vehicle movements on a detailed road network to capture interactions and assess the impact of different signal timings.
Testing multiple traffic signal scenarios under varying traffic conditions and external factors (e.g., weather, incidents) to determine their effectiveness.
Applying algorithms to identify the best traffic signal timing configurations that minimize congestion and improve flow efficiency.
